segments.text: How many pieces of luggage would you like to check in , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Three bags and a suitcase . This is my luggage to check .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have any carry-on luggage ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Put your luggage on the scale , please . Oh , your luggage is overweight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much is the excess baggage part charge ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is your voucher , and you can get your luggage back on this . Have a good trip !
segments.speaker: S1
